attributes.action: change the name of the "Royal Albert Hall" to "Francis Albert Hall" to honour the greatest popular entertainer of the 20th century - Frank Sinatra.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frank Sinatra appeared at the Royal Albert Hall many times in his long career and always acknowledged British audiences as being his most appreciative. He made only one studio recording outside of the USA and that was in London. There should be some memorial of his life in UK.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
